synopsis.text: After heroically protecting Earth from a dangerous comet, the four brave pilots of Stratos 4 – Mikaze, Karin, Ayamo and Shizuha – return home to their base on Shimojijima Island. As they settle back into training and their usual routines, they receive a surprising visit from fellow space pilots Chizuru and Annette. The Comet Blasters bring alarming news – Orbital Station 7 is in grave danger. Though the threat of comets attacking Earth has passed for now, there are still adventures ahead for the courageous Meteor Sweepers of Stratos 4 as they take to the stars once more to aid their friends. With teamwork and determination, these talented girls have proven again and again that they will selflessly risk it all to safeguard planet and people. As new challenges arise on the space station, they stand ready to answer the call.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
